0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
};


static const unsigned char neige[] PROGMEM = 
{
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x07,0xFC,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x0C,0x06,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x18,0x01,0x00,0x60,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x30,0x01,
0x30,0x70,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x20,0x01,0x30,0x70,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x0F,0xC0,0x01,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x18,0x40,0x01,0x04,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x30,0x40,0x01,
0x0E,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x60,0x40,0x01,0x0E,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x40,0x40,0x01,
0x0C,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0xC0,0x40,0x01,0x00,0x60,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x80,0x60,0x01,
0x00,0x60,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x01,0x00,0x30,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0x18,0x01,

0x01,0x00,0x08,0x01,0x00,0x18,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0x0C,0x01,
0x07,0x18,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x03,0x00,0x04,0x01,0x06,0x18,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x02,0x00,0x00,0x01,
0x34,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x02,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x30,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x02,0x00,0x00,0x01,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x02,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0x40,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x02,0x00,0x00,0x01,
0x00,0xC0,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x02,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0xCC,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x02,0x00,0x00,0x01,
0x00,0x0C,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,

0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,

0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,
};



void setup()
{
  Serial.begin(9600);
  Wire.begin();

     SeeedGrayOled.init(SH1107G);
     SeeedGrayOled.clearDisplay();
    SeeedGrayOled.drawBitmap(logo,96*96/8);
}

//functions
boolean is_a_number(int n)
{
  return n >= 48 && n <= 57;
}
      
  int ascii2int(int n, int byte_read) {
  return n*10 + (byte_read - 48);
}


void loop()
{

    //(code,temp,jj,mm,aaaa,humi)
    //(17 int au total a recevoir)
    String ok="b";
    String nmois;
    int jour=0;
    int mois=0;
    int annee=1;
    int temp ;
    int humi=0;
    int code;
    int moym=0;
    int moya=0;
    bool affiche=false;
    int byte_read;
    int recieved_integer=0;
  
  delay(1000);

    
  if (Serial.available() > 0) {
   /* 
    //lecture code
    String tout = Serial.readString();
    Serial.println(tout);
    code=tout[0];
    temp=(tout[1]+tout[2]);*/

    //(3,12,12,01,2018,43)
    byte_read = Serial.read();
    recieved_integer=0;
    if ( is_a_number(byte_read) ) {
            code = ascii2int(recieved_integer, byte_read);}
    
   //lecture temp
    for(int i=1;i>=0;i--){
          byte_read = Serial.read();
          recieved_integer=0;
          if ( is_a_number(byte_read) ) {
                    recieved_integer = ascii2int(0 , byte_read);
                    temp = temp + recieved_integer*pow(10,i);
 
    }

    } 
    //lecture jour
    for(int i=1;i>=0;i--){
          byte_read = Serial.read();
          recieved_integer=0;
          if ( is_a_number(byte_read) ) {
                    recieved_integer = ascii2int(recieved_integer, byte_read);
                    jour= jour + recieved_integer*pow(10,i);
               
    }
    }
    
    //lecture mois
    for(int i=1;i>=0;i--){
          byte_read = Serial.read();
          recieved_integer=0;
          if ( is_a_number(byte_read) ) {
                    recieved_integer = ascii2int(recieved_integer, byte_read);
                    mois= mois + recieved_integer*pow(10,i);
               
    }
    }
    
  //lecture annee
    for(int i=3;i>=0;i--){
          byte_read = Serial.read();
          recieved_integer=0;
          if ( is_a_number(byte_read) ) {
                    recieved_integer = ascii2int(recieved_integer, byte_read);
                    annee= annee + recieved_integer*pow(10,i);
                    
               
    }
    }

    //lecture humi
    for(int i=1;i>=0;i--){
          byte_read = Serial.read();
          recieved_integer=0;
          if ( is_a_number(byte_read) ) {
                    recieved_integer = ascii2int(recieved_integer, byte_read);
                    humi= humi + recieved_integer*pow(10,i);
               
    }
    }

     //lecture moyenne matin
    for(int i=1;i>=0;i--){
          byte_read = Serial.read();
          recieved_integer=0;
          if ( is_a_number(byte_read) ) {
                    recieved_integer = ascii2int(recieved_integer, byte_read);
                    moym= moym + recieved_integer*pow(10,i);
               
    }
    }

     //lecture loyenne aprem
    for(int i=1;i>=0;i--){
          byte_read = Serial.read();
          recieved_integer=0;
          if ( is_a_number(byte_read) ) {
                    recieved_integer = ascii2int(recieved_integer, byte_read);
                    moya= moya + recieved_integer*pow(10,i);
               
    }
    }



    //Serial.print(jour);
    //Serial.print(mois);
    //Serial.print(annee);
    //Serial.print(temp);
    //Serial.print(humi);
    //Serial.print(code);
    
    mois=int(mois);
    
  
    switch(mois) {
      case 1:
      nmois="Janvier"; break;
      case 2:
      nmois="Fevrier"; break;
      case 3:
      nmois="Mars"; break;
      case 4:
      nmois="Avril"; break;
      case 5:
      nmois="Mai"; break;
      case 6:
      nmois="Juin"; break;
      case 7:
      nmois="Juillet"; break;
      case 8:
      nmois="Aout"; break;
      case 9:
      nmois="Septembre"; break;
      case 10:
      nmois="Octobre"; break;
      case 11:
      nmois="Novembre"; break;
      case 12:
      nmois="Decembre"; break;
      default:
      break;
    }
    delay(2000);
    affiche=true;
  
  }
  
  if(affiche)  {
    
  affiche = false;
  //informe la pi que l'affichage est OK
  ok="a";
  Serial.println(ok);
  delay(1000);

  //transformer int en const char*
  char afftemp[5];
  String a=String(temp);
  a.toCharArray(afftemp,5);

  char affjour[5];
  a=String(jour);
  a.toCharArray(affjour,5);

  char affmois[10];
  nmois.toCharArray(affmois,10);

  char affannee[5];
  a=String(annee);
  a.toCharArray(affannee,5);

  char affhumi[3];
  a=String(humi);
  a.toCharArray(affhumi,3);

  char affmoym[3];
  a=String(moym);
  a.toCharArray(affmoym,3);

  char affmoya[3];
  a=String(moya);
  a.toCharArray(affmoya,3);


  //Serial.println(afftemp);
  //init
  SeeedGrayOled.init(SH1107G);
  SeeedGrayOled.clearDisplay();          

  //draw bitmat
  
  if(code==1){  SeeedGrayOled.drawBitmap(soleil,96*96/8); }
  if(code==2){  SeeedGrayOled.drawBitmap(nuage,96*96/8); }
  if(code==3){  SeeedGrayOled.drawBitmap(pluie,96*96/8); }
  if(code==4){  SeeedGrayOled.drawBitmap(nuagesoleil,96*96/8); }
  if(code==5){  SeeedGrayOled.drawBitmap(neige,96*96/8); }
  
  

  //vertical mode
  SeeedGrayOled.setVerticalMode();  // Set to vertical mode for displaying text

  //affichage de la temperature:
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(2,9);  //set Cursor to ith line, 0th column
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); //Set Grayscale level. Any number between 0 - 15.
  SeeedGrayOled.putString("o"); 

  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(3,7);  
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString(afftemp); 

  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(3,10);  
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString("C");

  //humi
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(5,7); 
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString(affhumi); 

  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(5,11); 
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString("%"); 
  
  //date
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(8,0); 
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString(affjour); 
  
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(8,3);  
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString(affmois);

   
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(9,0);  
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString(affannee);

  //moym
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(11,0); 
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString("Moy Mat:"); 
  
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(11,9);  
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString(affmoym);
  
  //moya
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(12,0); 
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString("Moy Apm:"); 
  
  SeeedGrayOled.setTextXY(12,9);  
  SeeedGrayOled.setGrayLevel(8); 
  SeeedGrayOled.putString(affmoya);
 

  }
}
